text:
Checkr (https://checkr.com/) is looking to hire devs with 4+ years of relevant experience. Company is 2.5 yrs old, 100ppl, 20 engineers, already quite profitable, a lot of fun :). Just built a brand new office in SOMA.

http://bit.ly/checkr-full-stack

http://bit.ly/checkr-backend-eng

http://bit.ly/checkr-ml-eng

if you wanna check out the office come by march 29 for a meetup we're hosting. https://www.meetup.com/fintech-devs-and-pms/events/237622300...
